io.spine.server.storage

Interface MessageRecordSpec.ExtractId<R extends com.google.protobuf.Message,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of records from which to extract the ID value
    I - the type of the record identifiers to retrieve
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<R,I>
    Enclosing class:
    MessageRecordSpec<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

    @Immutable
 @FunctionalInterface
public static interface MessageRecordSpec.ExtractId<R extends com.google.protobuf.Message,I>
extends com.google.common.base.Function<R,I>
    A method object to extract the value of an record identifier given an instance of a record.

    Once some storage is passed a record to store, the value of the record identifier has to be determined. To avoid passing the ID value for each record, one defines an way to obtain the identifier value from the record instance itself â€” by defining an ExtractId as a part of the record specification for the storage.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.google.common.base.Function

        apply, equals

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.function.Function

        andThen, compose, identity
